```{r setup}
library(mothuR)
```

Reading distance files:
 
```{r read_dist}
dist_filepath <- system.file("extdata",
                             "sample.final.thetayc.0.03.lt.ave.dist",
                             package = "mothuR")
dist_tbl <- read_dist(dist_filepath)
head(dist_tbl)
```
